word_mean: 单细胞的：由单细胞组成的，如细菌

sentence.Network_en: The fungus is unicellular and exists in both haploid and diploid phases.
sentence.Network_cn: 它是单细胞真菌,有单倍体和二倍体两种存在形态.

sentence.Network_en: An autotrophic, unicellular, green alga presents the minimum of specialization.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个自养的单细胞绿藻表现最小程度的特化.

sentence.Network_en: The central issue of cell reproduction can be seen more clearly in the unicellular organisms.
sentence.Network_cn: 细胞繁殖的中心内容在单细胞有机物里可以看得更清楚.
